import "./technology.scss"; import $ from 'jquery'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; // You can also use for styles export default function Intro() { useEffect(() => { $(document).ready(function () { if (!$('#myCanvas').tagcanvas({ textColour: "#08fdd8", outlineColour: "transparent", reverse: true, depth: 0.8, maxSpeed: 0.05, weight: true }, "tags")) { $('#myCanvasContainer'); } }); }, []); // The empty dependency array ensures this effect runs once on component mount return (
